bug.author: jiemar
bug.summary: short circult read didnot happened when presto colocated with alluxio
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.3 Describe the bug 47 presto workers deployed with 47 alluxio workers . set alluxio.user.file.replication.min=47 then i query sql for many times , more than 2000 times. but short circult read stays 0B why did it not do short circult read?
